name: All Starts with Nothing
description:
All Starts with Nothing is a game about creation of the universe. Made for Ludum Dare 45. Made by @Rensei_

Controls:

- Left Mouse Button

- Mouse Movement

WARNING!

If You can't progress, sometimes objects might get stuck in edges of the screen. Try to move the mouse around the edges to gather stuck parts. I recommend the downloaded version, the web version might not play the sound at the end for some reason.

Known bugs:

- Audio crackling, stopping, popping when there is a lot of objects on the screen.
